AddMembersToGroup.name: AddMembersToGroup
AddMembersToGroup.description: Grants permission to add a list of members (users or groups) to a group

AssociateDelegateToResource.name: AssociateDelegateToResource
AssociateDelegateToResource.description: Grants permission to add a member (user or group) to the resource's set of delegates

AssociateMemberToGroup.name: AssociateMemberToGroup
AssociateMemberToGroup.description: Grants permission to add a member (user or group) to the group's set

CancelMailboxExportJob.name: CancelMailboxExportJob
CancelMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to cancel a currently running mailbox export job

CreateAlias.name: CreateAlias
CreateAlias.description:
Grants permission to add an alias to the set of a given member (user or group) of
                                                WorkMail

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description:
Grants permission to create a group that can be used in WorkMail by calling the RegisterToWorkMail
                                                operation

CreateInboundMailFlowRule.name: CreateInboundMailFlowRule
CreateInboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to create an inbound email flow rule which will apply to all email
                                                sent to an organization

CreateMailDomain.name: CreateMailDomain
CreateMailDomain.description: Grants permission to create a mail domain

CreateMailUser.name: CreateMailUser
CreateMailUser.description: Grants permission to create a user in the directory

CreateMobileDeviceAccessRule.name: CreateMobileDeviceAccessRule
CreateMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to create a new mobile device access rule

CreateOrganization.name: CreateOrganization
CreateOrganization.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon WorkMail organization

CreateOutboundMailFlowRule.name: CreateOutboundMailFlowRule
CreateOutboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to create an outbound email flow rule which will apply to all email
                                                sent from an organization

CreateResource.name: CreateResource
CreateResource.description: Grants permission to create a new WorkMail resource

CreateSmtpGateway.name: CreateSmtpGateway
CreateSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to register an SMTP gateway to a WorkMail organization

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description:
Grants permission to create a user, which can be enabled afterwards by calling the
                                                RegisterToWorkMail operation

DeleteAccessControlRule.name: DeleteAccessControlRule
DeleteAccessControlRule.description: Grants permission to delete an access control rule

DeleteAlias.name: DeleteAlias
DeleteAlias.description:
Grants permission to remove one or more specified aliases from a set of aliases for
                                                a given user

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group from WorkMail

DeleteInboundMailFlowRule.name: DeleteInboundMailFlowRule
DeleteInboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to remove an inbound email flow rule to no longer apply to emails
                                                sent to an organization

DeleteMailDomain.name: DeleteMailDomain
DeleteMailDomain.description: Grants permission to remove an unused mail domain from an organization

DeleteMailboxPermissions.name: DeleteMailboxPermissions
DeleteMailboxPermissions.description: Grants permission to delete permissions granted to a member (user or group)

DeleteMobileDevice.name: DeleteMobileDevice
DeleteMobileDevice.description: Grants permission to remove a mobile device from a user

DeleteMobileDeviceAccessRule.name: DeleteMobileDeviceAccessRule
DeleteMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to deletes a mobile device access rule

DeleteOrganization.name: DeleteOrganization
DeleteOrganization.description:
Grants permission to delete an Amazon WorkMail organization and all underlying AWS
                                                resources managed by Amazon WorkMail as part of the organization

DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule.name: DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule
DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to remove an outbound email flow rule so that it no longer applies
                                                to emails sent from an organization

DeleteResource.name: DeleteResource
DeleteResource.description: Grants permission to delete the specified resource

DeleteRetentionPolicy.name: DeleteRetentionPolicy
DeleteRetentionPolicy.description:
Grants permission to delete the retention policy based on the supplied organization
                                                and policy identifiers

DeleteSmtpGateway.name: DeleteSmtpGateway
DeleteSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to remove an SMTP gateway from an organization

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user from WorkMail and all subsequent systems

DeregisterFromWorkMail.name: DeregisterFromWorkMail
DeregisterFromWorkMail.description: Grants permission to mark a user, group, or resource as no longer used in WorkMail

DescribeDirectories.name: DescribeDirectories
DescribeDirectories.description: Grants permission to show a list of directories available for use in creating an organization

DescribeGroup.name: DescribeGroup
DescribeGroup.description: Grants permission to read the details for a group

DescribeInboundMailFlowRule.name: DescribeInboundMailFlowRule
DescribeInboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to read the details of an inbound mail flow rule configured for
                                                an organization

DescribeKmsKeys.name: DescribeKmsKeys
DescribeKmsKeys.description: Grants permission to show a list of KMS Keys available for use in creating an organization

DescribeMailDomains.name: DescribeMailDomains
DescribeMailDomains.description: Grants permission to show the details of all mail domains associated with the organization

DescribeMailGroups.name: DescribeMailGroups
DescribeMailGroups.description: Grants permission to show the details of all groups associated with the organization

DescribeMailUsers.name: DescribeMailUsers
DescribeMailUsers.description: Grants permission to show the details of all users associated with the orgaization

DescribeMailboxExportJob.name: DescribeMailboxExportJob
DescribeMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a mailbox export job

DescribeOrganization.name: DescribeOrganization
DescribeOrganization.description: Grants permission to read details of an organization

DescribeOrganizations.name: DescribeOrganizations
DescribeOrganizations.description: Grants permission to show a summary of all organizations associated with the account

DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule.name: DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule
DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to read the details of an outbound mail flow rule configured for
                                                an organization

DescribeResource.name: DescribeResource
DescribeResource.description: Grants permission to read the details for a resource

DescribeSmtpGateway.name: DescribeSmtpGateway
DescribeSmtpGateway.description: Grants permission to read the details of an SMTP gateway registered to an organization

DescribeUser.name: DescribeUser
DescribeUser.description: Grants permission to read details for a user

DisableMailGroups.name: DisableMailGroups
DisableMailGroups.description:
Grants permission to disable a mail group when it is not being used, in order to allow
                                                it to be deleted

DisableMailUsers.name: DisableMailUsers
DisableMailUsers.description:
Grants permission to disable a user mailbox when it is no longer being used, in order
                                                to allow it to be deleted

DisassociateDelegateFromResource.name: DisassociateDelegateFromResource
DisassociateDelegateFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove a member from the resource's set of delegates

DisassociateMemberFromGroup.name: DisassociateMemberFromGroup
DisassociateMemberFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove a member from a group

EnableMailDomain.name: EnableMailDomain
EnableMailDomain.description: Grants permission to enable a mail domain in the organization

EnableMailGroups.name: EnableMailGroups
EnableMailGroups.description:
Grants permission to enable a mail group after it has been created to allow it to
                                                receive mail

EnableMailUsers.name: EnableMailUsers
EnableMailUsers.description:
Grants permission to enable a user's mailbox after it has been created to allow it
                                                to receive mail

GetAccessControlEffect.name: GetAccessControlEffect
GetAccessControlEffect.description:
Grants permission to get the effects of access control rules as they apply to a specified
                                                IPv4 address, access protocol action, or user ID.

GetDefaultRetentionPolicy.name: GetDefaultRetentionPolicy
GetDefaultRetentionPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the retention policy associated at an organizational
                                                level

GetJournalingRules.name: GetJournalingRules
GetJournalingRules.description:
Grants permission to read the configured journaling and fallback email addresses for
                                                email journaling

GetMailDomainDetails.name: GetMailDomainDetails
GetMailDomainDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mail domain

GetMailGroupDetails.name: GetMailGroupDetails
GetMailGroupDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mail group

GetMailUserDetails.name: GetMailUserDetails
GetMailUserDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the user's mailbox and account

GetMailboxDetails.name: GetMailboxDetails
GetMailboxDetails.description: Grants permission to read the details of the user's mailbox

GetMobileDeviceAccessEffect.name: GetMobileDeviceAccessEffect
GetMobileDeviceAccessEffect.description:
Grants permission to simulate the effect of the mobile device access rules for the
                                                given attributes of a sample access event

GetMobileDeviceDetails.name: GetMobileDeviceDetails
GetMobileDeviceDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of the mobile device

GetMobileDevicesForUser.name: GetMobileDevicesForUser
GetMobileDevicesForUser.description: Grants permission to get a list of the mobile devices associated with the user

GetMobilePolicyDetails.name: GetMobilePolicyDetails
GetMobilePolicyDetails.description:
Grants permission to get the details of the mobile device policy associated with the
                                                organization

ListAccessControlRules.name: ListAccessControlRules
ListAccessControlRules.description: Grants permission to list the access control rules

ListAliases.name: ListAliases
ListAliases.description: Grants permission to list the aliases associated with a given entity

ListGroupMembers.name: ListGroupMembers
ListGroupMembers.description:
Grants permission to read an overview of the members of a group. Users and groups
                                                can be members of a group

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list summaries of the organization's groups

ListInboundMailFlowRules.name: ListInboundMailFlowRules
ListInboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to list inbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListMailboxExportJobs.name: ListMailboxExportJobs
ListMailboxExportJobs.description: Grants permission to list mailbox export jobs

ListMailboxPermissions.name: ListMailboxPermissions
ListMailboxPermissions.description:
Grants permission to list the mailbox permissions associated with a user, group, or
                                                resource mailbox

ListMembersInMailGroup.name: ListMembersInMailGroup
ListMembersInMailGroup.description: Grants permission to get a list of all the members in a mail group

ListMobileDeviceAccessRules.name: ListMobileDeviceAccessRules
ListMobileDeviceAccessRules.description: Grants permission to list the mobile device access rules

ListOrganizations.name: ListOrganizations
ListOrganizations.description: Grants permission to list the non-deleted organizations

ListOutboundMailFlowRules.name: ListOutboundMailFlowRules
ListOutboundMailFlowRules.description: Grants permission to list outbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListResourceDelegates.name: ListResourceDelegates
ListResourceDelegates.description: Grants permission to list the delegates associated with a resource

ListResources.name: ListResources
ListResources.description: Grants permission to list the organization's resources.

ListSmtpGateways.name: ListSmtpGateways
ListSmtpGateways.description: Grants permission to list SMTP gateways registered to the organization

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags applied to an Amazon WorkMail organization resource

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permission to list the organization's users.

PutAccessControlRule.name: PutAccessControlRule
PutAccessControlRule.description: Grants permission to add a new access control rule

PutMailboxPermissions.name: PutMailboxPermissions
PutMailboxPermissions.description:
Grants permission to set permissions for a user, group, or resource, replacing any
                                                existing permissions

PutRetentionPolicy.name: PutRetentionPolicy
PutRetentionPolicy.description: Grants permission to add or update the retention policy

RegisterToWorkMail.name: RegisterToWorkMail
RegisterToWorkMail.description:
Grants permission to register an existing and disabled user, group, or resource for
                                                use by associating a mailbox and calendaring capabilities

RemoveMembersFromGroup.name: RemoveMembersFromGroup
RemoveMembersFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove members from a mail group

ResetPassword.name: ResetPassword
ResetPassword.description: Grants permission to allow the administrator to reset the password for a user

ResetUserPassword.name: ResetUserPassword
ResetUserPassword.description: Grants permission to reset the password for a user's account

SearchMembers.name: SearchMembers
SearchMembers.description: Grants permission to perform a prefix search to find a specific user in a mail group

SetAdmin.name: SetAdmin
SetAdmin.description: Grants permission to mark a user as being an administrator

SetDefaultMailDomain.name: SetDefaultMailDomain
SetDefaultMailDomain.description: Grants permission to set the default mail domain for the organization

SetJournalingRules.name: SetJournalingRules
SetJournalingRules.description: Grants permission to set journaling and fallback email addresses for email journaling

SetMailGroupDetails.name: SetMailGroupDetails
SetMailGroupDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details of the mail group which has just been created

SetMailUserDetails.name: SetMailUserDetails
SetMailUserDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details for the user account which has just been created

SetMobilePolicyDetails.name: SetMobilePolicyDetails
SetMobilePolicyDetails.description: Grants permission to set the details of a mobile policy associated with the organization

StartMailboxExportJob.name: StartMailboxExportJob
StartMailboxExportJob.description: Grants permission to start a new mailbox export job

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource

TestInboundMailFlowRules.name: TestInboundMailFlowRules
TestInboundMailFlowRules.description:
Grants permission to test what inbound rules will apply to an email with a given sender
                                                and recipient

TestOutboundMailFlowRules.name: TestOutboundMailFlowRules
TestOutboundMailFlowRules.description:
Grants permission to test what outbound rules will apply to an email with a given
                                                sender and recipient

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource

UpdateInboundMailFlowRule.name: UpdateInboundMailFlowRule
UpdateInboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to update the details of an inbound email flow rule which will apply
                                                to all email sent to an organization

UpdateMailboxQuota.name: UpdateMailboxQuota
UpdateMailboxQuota.description: Grants permission to update the maximum size (in MB) of the user's mailbox

UpdateMobileDeviceAccessRule.name: UpdateMobileDeviceAccessRule
UpdateMobileDeviceAccessRule.description: Grants permission to update an mobile device access rule

UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule.name: UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule
UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule.description:
Grants permission to update the details of an outbound email flow rule which will
                                                apply to all email sent from an organization

UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress.name: UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress
UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress.description: Grants permission to update the primary email for a user, group, or resource

UpdateResource.name: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.description: Grants permission to update details for the resource

UpdateSmtpGateway.name: UpdateSmtpGateway
UpdateSmtpGateway.description:
Grants permission to update the details of an existing SMTP gateway registered to
                                                an organization

WipeMobileDevice.name: WipeMobileDevice
WipeMobileDevice.description: Grants permission to remotely wipe the mobile device associated with a user's account
